trends: There has been one other sighting in Lipan
There were no other sightings in Lipan on or around December 28th 2007
divs: sighting detailsi was driving back from lipan, december 28th about 7:30 pm ...it was overcast and dark and i notice the ground flickering, like a strobe lite and it made me look up and see two distinct circles of white just sitting there..they started to move and then just disappeared, moving toward the se. i thought i had seen a falling star or even some kind of falling depris. i was close to home and told my son that i had seen a falling star or meteor, as i have seen alot of them over the years, but has never expereinced the strobe effect that caught my attention in the first place. i didn't think much more about it but when the news broke on our local tv stations about all the sightings over stephenville. it made me re-think about that night.i even called my neighbors who were behind me that night about a 1\2 mile and they did not see them. but i saw them. i live close to where hood, palo pinto and erath come together. i don't think it was a falling star as they move horizonal thru the sky and the strobe effect was effected in getting my attention. i was not fearful but awed in it all. i know what i saw that night and if i can help in anyway..let me know.
Summary: strobe effect on pasture..looked up..saw 2 white glowing circles..moved toward southeast and then disappeared
